goals.description: Create advanced data processing and ETL pipeline system
goals.success_criteria: Comprehensive ETL system with data transformation, validation, and pipeline orchestration supporting multiple data sources and formats

goals.description: Implement real-time analytics and streaming data processing
goals.success_criteria: Real-time analytics engine with streaming data processing, windowing functions, and live dashboard capabilities

goals.description: Build machine learning and predictive analytics framework
goals.success_criteria: ML framework with model training, prediction, and automated feature engineering for business intelligence
